languages.text: К сожалению, после первых же облав и арестов мятежники быстро сумели адаптироваться и сменить стратегию.

traits.locale_text: К сожалению, после первых же облав и арестов мятежники быстро сумели адаптироваться и сменить стратегию.

languages.text: Unfortunately, after the first round of arrests and raids, the rebels quickly adapted and altered their strategy.
languages.original_text: К сожалению, после первых же облав и арестов мятежники быстро сумели адаптироваться и сменить стратегию.

traits.locale_text: Unfortunately, after the first round of arrests and raids, the rebels quickly adapted and altered their strategy.
Unfortunately, after the first round of arrests and raids, the rebels quickly adapted and altered their strategy.
Unfortunately, after the first round of arrests and raids, the rebels quickly adapted and altered their strategy.
Unfortunately, after the first round of arrests and raids, the rebels quickly adapted and altered their strategy.

languages.text: 残念ながら、最初の逮捕と襲撃の後に反乱軍はただちに体勢を立て直し、戦略を変えた。
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, after the first round of arrests and raids, the rebels quickly adapted and altered their strategy.

traits.locale_text: 残念ながら、最初の逮捕と襲撃の後に反乱軍はただちに体勢を立て直し、戦略を変えた。

languages.text: 但遗憾的是，在第一轮逮捕与突袭之后，叛军很快对此进行了调整，改变了策略。
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, after the first round of arrests and raids, the rebels quickly adapted and altered their strategy.

traits.locale_text: 但遗憾的是，在第一轮逮捕与突袭之后，叛军很快对此进行了调整，改变了策略。

languages.text: Lamentablemente, después de las detenciones y redadas iniciales, los rebeldes no tardaron en adaptarse y modificaron su estrategia.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, after the first round of arrests and raids, the rebels quickly adapted and altered their strategy.

traits.locale_text: Lamentablemente, después de las detenciones y redadas iniciales, los rebeldes no tardaron en adaptarse y modificaron su estrategia.

languages.text: Leider passten sich die Rebellen nach den ersten Verhaftungen und Razzien rasch an und änderten ihre Strategie.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, after the first round of arrests and raids, the rebels quickly adapted and altered their strategy.

traits.locale_text: Leider passten sich die Rebellen nach den ersten Verhaftungen und Razzien rasch an und änderten ihre Strategie.

languages.text: Malheureusement, après la première série d'arrestations et de descentes, les rebelles ne tardèrent pas à s'adapter et à modifier leur stratégie.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, after the first round of arrests and raids, the rebels quickly adapted and altered their strategy.

traits.locale_text: Malheureusement, après la première série d'arrestations et de descentes, les rebelles ne tardèrent pas à s'adapter et à modifier leur stratégie.

languages.text: Ne yazık ki ilk tutuklamalar ve baskınların ardından isyancılar, duruma süratle ayak uydurdu ve stratejilerini değiştirdi.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, after the first round of arrests and raids, the rebels quickly adapted and altered their strategy.

traits.locale_text: Ne yazık ki ilk tutuklamalar ve baskınların ardından isyancılar, duruma süratle ayak uydurdu ve stratejilerini değiştirdi.
